name: Escape Speed
description:
Escape Speed is a game about going fast. Your goal is to fly through 50 levels of blocks in the fastest time possible. Hitting a block that is the same color as your ship gives makes you faster, while hitting a block that is different than the color of your ship slows you down and takes away 1 of your lives, of which you have 3 per level. Complete all 50 as fast as you can!

MODES

Gauntlet - Complete all 50 modes as fast as you can

Randomizer - Play through a level with random sets of blocks and items

Custom Level - Make and play through your own custom level
